DataElement.preferredName: Definitive Surgical Procedure Performed Age Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of the age of a person when the definitive surgical procedure was performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Supplying or being a final or conclusive settlement or result._A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery._Performed; carried out.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Supplying or being a final or conclusive settlement or result.:A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Concepts.definition: Supplying or being a final or conclusive settlement or result.

A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity measured, assigned or computed to describe an individual's age.
